mapper.insert: insert into repair(repair_seq, repair_cate, repair_kind, repair_var1, repair_var2, repair_var3, repair_content, repair_code, repair_count, repair_price) values (repair_seq.nextval, #{repair_cate}, #{repair_kind}, #{repair_var1}, #{repair_var2}, #{repair_var3}, #{repair_content}, #{repair_code}, #{repair_count}, #{repair_price})
